item.description: Publications While working with the Open Search Foundation in the EU, I co-authored a technical research paper with professors and researchers from European institutions including Erasmus University Rotterdam, the Leibniz Supercomputing Centre, and TU Munich. It was presented at the 5th International Open Search Symposium (OSSYM) at CERN, Geneva. Conceptual Design and Implementation of a Prototype Search Application using the Open Search Index ‚Äî Read on Zenodo Writings As part of internships and coursework, I‚Äôve written several technical papers:

item.title: About me
item.description: “Finished products are for decadent minds.” ‚Äî Bail Channis, Second Foundation Hi! üëã I’m Rohit ‚Äî an entrepreneur, computer scientist, and product builder. I graduated in Computer Science from the University of Waterloo, spent time around the LHC at CERN (even published a small paper), and today I split my energy between shipping valuable software and understanding how systems scale behind it ‚Äî from product reasoning to quantum information.
